SigningTool.label: Signing Tool
SigningTool.help_text: Select tool to be used for signing, or disable signing.

SigningToolPath.label: Signing Tool Path
SigningToolPath.help_text: Provide the path to your signing tool executable, such as /usr/bin/openssl or C:\OpenSSL-Win32\bin\openssl.exe

PrivateKeyPath.label: Private Key Path
PrivateKeyPath.help_text: Path to private RSA key (in PEM format) to be used for signing. Key is required if using OpenSSL.

RevocationEnabled.label: Key revocation feature enabled
RevocationEnabled.help_text: Set to True when revoking the OEM public key hash from fuses.

RevocationkeyPath.label: Private key path for revocation
RevocationkeyPath.help_text: Path to private RSA key to be revoked (in PEM format). Key is required if enabling revocation flow.
